title: PGPD Announces the Graduation of Session 133
body:
The
Prince George’s County Police Department is proud to announce the graduation
of Session 133 from the Prince George’s County Police Department’s
Training Academy. Of the 23 graduates,18 will join us here
at the PGPD. Of the remaining five graduates, two will join the Prince George’s
County Office of the Sheriff, one will join the Maryland-National Capital Park
Police and two will wear the uniform of the City of Bowie Police
Department.We’re
looking forward to celebrating this accomplishment with family and friends of
the graduates and officially welcoming the newest members of the PGPD family.When:
  Thursday, November 9, 2017Time:
    11:00 amWhere:  Prince
George’s County Police Headquarters             
7600 Barlowe Road             
Palmer Park, MDMembers
of the community and the media are welcome to attend. 
Posted by


Prince George's County Police
